about.title: ABOUT
about.content: Thang Long sparkling wine has a characteristic flavor of naturally fermented fruit products with light alcohol content and refreshing bubbles. Thang Long sparkling wine creates a fragrant, gentle, and joyful feeling.
about.content2: The product is bottled in 750ml capacity. Thang Long sparkling wine has a characteristic flavor of naturally fermented fruit products with light alcohol content and refreshing bubbles. Thang Long sparkling wine creates a fragrant, gentle, and joyful feeling.
about.content3: The product is bottled in 750ml capacity.

home.about.fallback.title: ABOUT
home.about.fallback.content: Welcome to DinkShop - a place that provides excellent wine bottles from all over the world.
home.about.api.title: ABOUT
home.about.api.content: Wine House is proud to bring high-quality wine bottles from all over the world. With over 40 years of experience in the industry, we are committed to providing the best products at reasonable prices. From rich red wines to delicate champagnes, Wine House is the ideal destination for wine lovers.
testimonial.content.1: I am very satisfied with the quality of wine at Wine House. Excellent service and high-quality products.
testimonial.content.2: Wine House is always a trusted address when I need to find special wine bottles for my restaurant.
testimonial.content.3: The wine collection at Wine House is very diverse and of high quality. I always find unique bottles here.
blog.excerpt.1: Discover how to properly enjoy red wine to fully appreciate the flavor and essence of each drop. From serving temperature to opening the bottle and decanting.
blog.title.2: CHAMPAGNE AND SPARKLING WINE - THE DIFFERENCE
blog.excerpt.2: Learn the difference between true Champagne and other sparkling wines. Production processes, regions and unique flavor characteristics of each type.
blog.excerpt.3: Rosé is not just a summer trend but also a perfect choice for many other occasions. Explore the charming pink world of Rosé wine.
blog.excerpt.4: White wine with elegant, fresh flavors is a great choice for hot summer days. Learn about different grape varieties and production styles.
blog.title.5: THE ART OF PAIRING WINE WITH FOOD
blog.excerpt.5: Learn how to combine wine with food to create the perfect culinary experience. From basic principles to expert tips.
blog.excerpt.6: Detailed guide on how to store wine to maintain quality and flavor. Temperature, humidity, light and bottle placement all have important effects.
